about_the_game:
Dive into the creative process and the amazing craft behind the creation of Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 with its official, 83-page digital artbook compiling never-before-seen concept art, 3D models and rich testimonies by the development team.

Foreword by Oliver Hollis-Leick, Creative Director of Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2

Commentary by Dmitry Grigorenko, Game Director, and his team of Character Artists, Concept Artists, and Level Artists.

content_descriptors.notes: Some of the artworks in the artbook contain blood and depict violent scenes.
